name: Hippiefication
description:
Gamux Meeting Jam 2018 - Solving conflicts without violence - Hippiefication

Destroy zombies using music and bring back the color of the world!

Don't let the monsters pass the green bar, shoot music beams at them with your mouse to transform them back to humans. Control your jetpack with the space button.

Try to make it to the Boss!

Made in 24 hours by:

Guilherme Lima

Mikael Müller

Marcelo Peralta
